name: Rocket Hat PUBLIC BETA
description:
As SAGE gets closer and closer, I've decided to release a small public beta to get more feedback for the game

Huge thanks to Buwomp for helping me finish it by the end of the month(https://buwomp.itch.io/)

This beta includes the first level.

Controls can be mapped, the defaults are

Jump - Space

Sprint - W

Move - Arrow keys
